mapper.update: update spt_biddoc set BIDDOC_NO = #{biddocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIDDER = #{bidder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIDDOC_TIME = #{biddocTime,jdbcType=DATE}, BIDDOC_CONTENT = #{biddocContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BID_RESULT = #{bidResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from spt_biddoc where BIDDOC_NO like #{biddocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BIDDER like #{bidder,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BIDDOC_CONTENT like #{biddocContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS like #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BID_RESULT like #{bidResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
